knowledgebase.noArticles: No articles found in this category

account.editProfileDescription: Update your personal information and preferences

account.ticketSignatureHint: This signature will be automatically appended to all your ticket replies. Supports Markdown formatting.

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.description: Manage your API keys for programmatic access

apiKeys.privateKeyWarning: Keep this private key secure! It won't be shown again.

apiKeys.regenerateWarning: This will invalidate the current keys. Are you sure?

importantInfo.title: Important Information
importantInfo.persistent: API keys are persistent and don't expire
importantInfo.accessScope: Keys have full access to your account
importantInfo.security: Keep your private keys secure and never share them

connection.info: Real-time console and stats will be available once connected

serverAllocations.title: Allocations
serverAllocations.description: Manage your server's network allocations and ports.
serverAllocations.noAllocationPermission: You do not have permission to manage server allocations.
serverAllocations.allocationStatusDescription: You are currently using {current} of {limit} allowed allocations for this server.
serverAllocations.noAllocationsDescription: This server doesn't have any network allocations yet. You can create custom allocations or use auto-allocation to automatically assign available free allocations.
serverAllocations.confirmDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this allocation? This action cannot be undone.
serverAllocations.confirmSetPrimaryDescription: Are you sure you want to set this allocation as primary? This will become the main connection for your server.
serverAllocations.selectAllocationDescription: Choose a specific allocation to assign, or select "Auto" to randomly assign one.
serverAllocations.noAvailableAllocations: No available allocations found on this node.
serverAllocations.searchAllocations: Search by IP, port, alias, or notes...

tickets.title: Support Tickets
tickets.viewAndManage: View and manage your support tickets
tickets.createFirstTicket: Create your first ticket to get help
tickets.deleteTicketConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this ticket?
tickets.createTicketDescription: Fill out the form below to create a new support ticket
tickets.serverHint: If this issue is related to a specific server
tickets.categoryDescription: Select the category that best describes your issue.
tickets.priorityDescription: Choose the urgency of your request.
tickets.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
tickets.selectServerDescription: Select the server associated with this ticket.
tickets.ticketClosed: This ticket is closed. You can no longer reply.
tickets.deleteMessageConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this message?

eula.title: Accept Minecraft EULA
eula.description: The Minecraft EULA must be accepted to run this server.
eula.eulaMessage: By changing the setting below to TRUE you are indicating your agreement to our EULA.
eula.eulaExplanation: The Minecraft End User License Agreement (EULA) contains the rules you must follow when running a Minecraft server.
eula.failedToStartServer: Failed to auto-start server. Please start it manually.

javaVersion.title: Java Version Incompatibility Detected
javaVersion.description: The server detected an incorrect Java version.
javaVersion.recommendation: We detected that your server requires a different Java version than what is currently selected.

pidLimit.title: Process Limit Reached
pidLimit.description: Your server has reached the maximum number of allowed processes.
pidLimit.explanation: This usually happens when plugins or mods spawn too many threads or subprocesses, or if the server has been running for a long time with a memory leak.
pidLimit.suggestion1: Restart your server to clear stuck processes
pidLimit.suggestion2: Check your plugins for known issues with thread usage

serverActivities.title: Server Activity
serverActivities.description: View the audit logs for this server.
serverActivities.noActivityPermission: You do not have permission to view server activities.

details.description: Detailed information about this server event.

serverActivities.noActivitiesDescription: This server has no recorded activity yet.
serverActivities.noActivitiesSearchDescription: Try adjusting your search query or filters to find what you are looking for.

serverDatabases.title: Databases
serverDatabases.description: Manage databases and database users for this server
serverDatabases.noDatabasePermission: You do not have permission to manage server databases.
serverDatabases.createDatabaseDescription: Create a new database and user on a database host
serverDatabases.databaseNameHelp: The name of the database to create
serverDatabases.remoteAccessHelp: Host pattern for remote access (e.g., % for any host)
serverDatabases.maxConnectionsHelp: Maximum number of concurrent connections (0 for unlimited)
serverDatabases.databaseLimitReachedDescription: You have reached the maximum number of databases for this server (limit: {limit}). Please delete some databases to create a new one.
serverDatabases.sensitiveInfoDescription: This dialog contains sensitive database credentials including passwords. Please ensure you are in a secure environment before proceeding.
serverDatabases.rememberChoice: Remember my choice and do not show this warning again
serverDatabases.rememberedChoiceCleared: Remembered choice has been cleared. You will see the warning again.
serverDatabases.noDatabasesDescription: Create your first database to start storing and managing your data
serverDatabases.noDatabasesNoLimit: This server does not have database access enabled
serverDatabases.confirmDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the database "{database}"? This action cannot be undone and will remove all data.
serverDatabases.noDatabaseHostsDescription: No database hosts are configured. Please contact an administrator to set up database hosts.

serverBackups.title: Backups
serverBackups.noBackupPermission: You do not have permission to manage server backups.
serverBackups.backupLimitReachedDescription: You have reached the maximum number of backups for this server (limit: {limit}). Please delete some backups to create a new one.
serverBackups.createBackupDescription: Create a new backup of your server data.
serverBackups.name: Backup Name
serverBackups.ignoreFilesPlaceholder: Enter file patterns to ignore (one per line)
serverBackups.ignoreFilesHelp: Specify files or directories to exclude from the backup. Use patterns like "*.log" or "temp/*".
serverBackups.restoreBackupDescription: Restore your server from this backup. This will overwrite existing files.
serverBackups.truncateDirectoryHelp: If enabled, the server directory will be completely cleared before restoration. Use with caution.
serverBackups.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this backup? This action cannot be undone.
serverBackups.noBackups: Oh... It looks like there are no backups here
serverBackups.noBackupsDescription: Create your first backup to protect your server data
serverBackups.noBackupsNoLimit: This server does not have backup access enabled
serverBackups.lockConfirm: Are you sure you want to lock this backup? Locked backups cannot be deleted or restored.
serverBackups.unlockConfirm: Are you sure you want to unlock this backup? This will allow deletion and restoration.
serverBackups.restoreLockedError: Backup is currently locked. Please unlock it first before restoring.

serverImport.title: Server Import
serverImport.description: Import server files from remote SFTP or FTP servers. The server must be offline for imports to work.
serverImport.featureDisabledDescription: Server import has been disabled by the administrator. Please contact support if you need to import files from remote servers.
serverImport.infoDescription: Import files from a remote SFTP or FTP server to your server. The server must be stopped before importing. Large imports may take a significant amount of time.
serverImport.noImportsDescription: Get started by importing files from a remote SFTP or FTP server. The server will be automatically stopped during the import process.
serverImport.drawerDescription: Configure the import settings to transfer files from a remote server.
serverImport.credentialsHelp: SSH/SFTP credentials for the remote server.
serverImport.pathsHelp: Configure where the files are coming from and where they should go.
serverImport.wipeHelp: If enabled, clears the destination directory before importing. Use with caution!
serverImport.wipeAllFiles: Wipe All Server Files Before Import
serverImport.wipeAllFilesHelp: If enabled, deletes ALL files and folders in the server root directory before importing. This ensures a completely clean import.
serverImport.wipeAllFilesWarning: ⚠️ This will permanently delete ALL existing server files before importing!

validation.sourceLocationInvalid: Source location must be an absolute path (starting with /)

serverFirewall.title: Firewall
serverFirewall.description: Manage incoming connections to your server.
serverFirewall.rulesInfoDescription: Control traffic to your server by creating allow or block rules based on IP addresses.
serverFirewall.featureDisabledDescription: Firewall management has been disabled by the administrator.
serverFirewall.noRulesDescription: Get started by creating your first firewall rule to secure your server.
serverFirewall.allocationHelp: Select the allocation (port) this rule applies to.
serverFirewall.confirmDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this firewall rule? This action cannot be undone.

serverProxy.title: Reverse Proxy
serverProxy.description: Configure domains to point to your server ports.
serverProxy.infoDescription: Proxies allow you to use a custom domain (e.g., play.example.com) to connect to your server without needing to specify a port. SSL certificates can be automatically generated securely.
serverProxy.noProxiesDescription: Create your first reverse proxy to connect valid domains to your server ports.
serverProxy.createModalDescription: Configure a new reverse proxy domain.
serverProxy.domainDescription: The domain name you want to use for this proxy.
serverProxy.deleteModalDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the proxy for {domain}?
serverProxy.featureDisabledDescription: The reverse proxy feature has been disabled by the administrator.
serverProxy.tipDns: DNS propagation may take a few minutes if you just updated your records.
serverProxy.tipPorts: Port 80 and 443 are reserved. Proxies map these standard ports to your internal server port.
serverProxy.tipSsl: SSL certificates are auto-renewed if you use Let's Encrypt. Verify your email is correct.

serverSubdomains.title: Subdomains
serverSubdomains.description: Manage subdomains assigned to your server.
serverSubdomains.limitReachedDescription: You have reached the maximum of {limit} subdomains for this server.
serverSubdomains.noSubdomainsDescription: Create a subdomain to easily access your server.
serverSubdomains.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {subdomain}? This action cannot be undone.
serverSubdomains.newSubdomainDescription: Create a new subdomain for your server.
serverSubdomains.subdomainHint: Enter the subdomain prefix (e.g. 'play' for play.example.com).

serverSchedules.title: Schedules
serverSchedules.description: Manage automated tasks for your server.
serverSchedules.noSchedulesDescription: Create your first schedule to automate server tasks.
serverSchedules.createScheduleDescription: Create a new automated task schedule.
serverSchedules.name: Schedule Name
serverSchedules.nameHelp: A descriptive name for this schedule.
serverSchedules.cronHelp: Define when this schedule should run using cron syntax.
serverSchedules.onlyWhenOnlineHelp: Should this schedule only run when the server is online?
serverSchedules.confirmDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete '{scheduleName}'? This action cannot be undone.
serverSchedules.noSchedulePermission: You do not have permission to view schedules.
serverSchedules.featureDisabledDescription: The schedules feature has been disabled by the administrator. Please contact support if you need to automate server tasks.

serverTasks.title: Schedule Tasks
serverTasks.createTaskDescription: Add a new task to this schedule.
serverTasks.noTasksDescription: Create your first task for this schedule.
serverTasks.actionHelp: The type of action this task will perform.
serverTasks.selectPowerActionHelp: Choose the power action to perform.
serverTasks.backupIgnoredFilesHelp: Files or directories to ignore during backup (comma-separated).
serverTasks.commandHelp: The command to execute on the server.
serverTasks.timeOffsetHelp: Delay in seconds before executing this task.
serverTasks.continueOnFailureHelp: Should the schedule continue if this task fails?
serverTasks.sequenceIdHelp: The order in which this task runs (1 = first).
serverTasks.confirmDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the {action} task ({payload})? This action cannot be undone.
serverTasks.noSchedulePermission: You do not have permission to view schedule tasks.

serverSubusers.title: Subusers
serverSubusers.description: Manage subusers and their permissions for this server
serverSubusers.managePermissionsDescription: Select the specific permissions this subuser should have access to. Choose individual permissions or select all to grant full access.
serverSubusers.addSubuserDialogDescription: Enter the email address of the user you want to add
serverSubusers.noSubusersDescription: No subusers have been added to this server yet. Add one to get started.
serverSubusers.noResultsDescription: No subusers match your search criteria.
serverSubusers.confirmDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to remove {email} from this server? This action cannot be undone.
serverSubusers.noSubuserManagementPermission: Only the server owner can manage subusers.
serverSubusers.featureDisabledDescription: Subuser management has been disabled by the administrator. Please contact the server owner if you need to manage access.

activity.name: Activity
activity.description: Permissions that control a user's ability to view server activity.

read.name: Read
read.description: Allows a user to view server activity.

subdomain.name: Subdomain
subdomain.description: Permissions that control a user's ability to manage subdomains for this server.

create.name: Create
create.description: Allows a user to create new subdomains for this server.

read.name: Read
read.description: Allows a user to view subdomains for this server.

update.name: Update
update.description: Allows a user to update subdomains for this server.

delete.name: Delete
delete.description: Allows a user to delete subdomains for this server.

manage.name: Manage
manage.description: Allows a user to create, update, delete, and sync subdomains for this server.

websocket.name: WebSocket
websocket.description: Allows a user to connect to the server console via WebSocket.

connect.name: Connect
connect.description: Allows a user to connect to the server console via WebSocket.

control.name: Control
control.description: Permissions that control a user's ability to control the power state of a server, or send commands.

console.name: Console
console.description: Allows a user to send commands to the server instance via the console.

start.name: Start
start.description: Allows a user to start the server if it is stopped.

stop.name: Stop
stop.description: Allows a user to stop a server if it is running.

restart.name: Restart
restart.description: Allows a user to perform a server restart. This allows them to start the server if it is offline, but not put the server in a completely stopped state.

user.name: User
user.description: Permissions that allow a user to manage other subusers on a server. They will never be able to edit their own account, or assign permissions they do not have themselves.

create.name: Create
create.description: Allows a user to create new subusers for the server.

read.name: Read
read.description: Allows the user to view subusers and their permissions for the server.

update.name: Update
update.description: Allows a user to modify other subusers.

delete.name: Delete
delete.description: Allows a user to delete a subuser from the server.

file.name: File
file.description: Permissions that control a user's ability to modify the filesystem for this server.

create.name: Create
create.description: Allows a user to create additional files and folders via the Panel or direct upload.

read.name: Read
read.description: Allows a user to view the contents of a directory, but not view the contents of or download files.

readContent.name: Read Content
readContent.description: Allows a user to view the contents of a given file. This will also allow the user to download files.

update.name: Update
update.description: Allows a user to update the contents of an existing file or directory.

delete.name: Delete
delete.description: Allows a user to delete files or directories.

archive.name: Archive
archive.description: Allows a user to archive the contents of a directory as well as decompress existing archives on the system.

sftp.name: SFTP
sftp.description: Allows a user to connect to SFTP and manage server files using the other assigned file permissions.

backup.name: Backup
backup.description: Permissions that control a user's ability to generate and manage server backups.

create.name: Create
create.description: Allows a user to create new backups for this server.

read.name: Read
read.description: Allows a user to view all backups that exist for this server.

delete.name: Delete
delete.description: Allows a user to remove backups from the system.

download.name: Download
download.description: Allows a user to download a backup for the server. Danger: this allows a user to access all files for the server in the backup.

restore.name: Restore
restore.description: Allows a user to restore a backup for the server. Danger: this allows the user to delete all of the server files in the process.

allocation.name: Allocation
allocation.description: Permissions that control a user's ability to modify the port allocations for this server.

read.name: Read
read.description: Allows a user to view all allocations currently assigned to this server. Users with any level of access to this server can always view the primary allocation.

create.name: Create
create.description: Allows a user to assign additional allocations to the server.

update.name: Update
update.description: Allows a user to change the primary server allocation and attach notes to each allocation.

delete.name: Delete
delete.description: Allows a user to delete an allocation from the server.

startup.name: Startup
startup.description: Permissions that control a user's ability to view this server's startup parameters.

read.name: Read
read.description: Allows a user to view the startup parameters for a server.

update.name: Update
update.description: Allows a user to modify startup parameters for a server.

docker_image.name: Update Docker Image
docker_image.description: Allows a user to modify the Docker image used for a server.

database.name: Database
database.description: Permissions that control a user's ability to create and manage server databases.

create.name: Create
create.description: Allows a user to create new databases for this server.

read.name: Read
read.description: Allows a user to view all databases that exist for this server.

update.name: Update
update.description: Allows a user to view passwords for databases.

delete.name: Delete
delete.description: Allows a user to remove databases from the system.

schedule.name: Schedule
schedule.description: Permissions that control a user's ability to manage automated tasks for this server.

create.name: Create
create.description: Allows a user to create new schedules for this server.

read.name: Read
read.description: Allows a user to view all schedules that exist for this server.

update.name: Update
update.description: Allows a user to modify schedules for a server.

delete.name: Delete
delete.description: Allows a user to remove schedules from the system.

settings.name: Settings
settings.description: Permissions that control a user's ability to view and modify server settings.

rename.name: Rename
rename.description: Allows a user to rename a server.

reinstall.name: Reinstall
reinstall.description: Allows a user to trigger a server reinstallation.

firewall.name: Firewall
firewall.description: Permissions that control a user's ability to manage firewall rules for this server.

read.name: Read
read.description: Allows a user to view the firewall rules for this server.

manage.name: Manage
manage.description: Allows a user to create, update, and delete firewall rules for this server.

proxy.name: Proxy
proxy.description: Permissions that control a user's ability to manage proxy rules for this server.

read.name: Read
read.description: Allows a user to view the proxy rules for this server.

manage.name: Manage
manage.description: Allows a user to create, update, and delete proxy rules for this server.

import.name: Import
import.description: Permissions that control a user's ability to manage server imports.

read.name: Read
read.description: Allows a user to view server imports.

manage.name: Manage
manage.description: Allows a user to create and manage server imports.

templates.name: Templates
templates.description: Permissions that control a user's ability to manage and install server templates.

read.name: Read
read.description: Allows a user to view available server templates.

install.name: Install
install.description: Allows a user to install templates on the server.

serverStartup.transferDescription: Transfer your server to another software environment.
serverStartup.title: Server Startup
serverStartup.description: Control your server's startup command, Docker image, and environment variables.
serverStartup.startupHelp: Edit the command that will be used to start the server.
serverStartup.variablesHelp: Configure environmental variables for your server.
serverStartup.valueDoesNotMatchFormat: Value does not match the required format.
serverStartup.noVariablesConfigured: No environment variables configured for this spell.
serverStartup.noStartupPermission: You do not have permission to manage startup settings or it has been disabled by an administrator.
serverStartup.spellSelectionHelp: Change your server software and configuration.
serverStartup.discoverRealmsHelp: Discover available software environments for this category.
serverStartup.doubleCheckConfiguration: Double check your configuration before applying

serverSettings.title: Server Settings
serverSettings.description: Manage your server configuration, SFTP details, and perform administrative actions.
serverSettings.serverInformationDescription: Update the identifying details for this server.
serverSettings.sftpDetailsDescription: Details for connecting to your server via SFTP.
serverSettings.sftpInfoDescription: Use an SFTP client like FileZilla or WinSCP. Enter the host, port, your username, and your account password.
serverSettings.reinstallWarning: This will reinstall the server. Your files may be overwritten depending on your choice.
serverSettings.reinstallConfirmation: Are you sure you want to reinstall this server?
serverSettings.deleteServerDescription: Permanently delete this server and all associated data.
serverSettings.deleteServerStep1Description: Deleting this server will remove all data, files, and configurations locally and remotely. This cannot be undone.
serverSettings.deleteServerStep2Description: Please acknowledge that this action is irreversible.
serverSettings.deleteServerStep2Confirm: I understand this action is irreversible
serverSettings.deleteServerStep3Description: Please solve this simple math problem to verify you are human.
serverSettings.deleteServerStep4Description: To confirm, please type the name of the server.

messages.drop_description: Release your files to start uploading to

editor.title: Editing: {file}
editor.loading_description: Please wait while the file content is loaded

create_folder.title: Create New Folder
create_folder.description: Enter a name for the new folder. It will be created in {root}

delete.title: Delete Files
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete {count} item(s)? This action cannot be undone.

move_copy.move_description: Move {count} item(s) to a new location.
move_copy.copy_description: Copy {count} item(s) to a new location.

compress.title: Compress Files
compress.description: Choose a format and name for your archive.
compress.name_help: Defaults to current timestamp if left empty.

pull.title: Pull File
pull.description: Download a file directly to your server from a URL.

wipe.title: Wipe All Files
wipe.description: This action is irreversible and extremely dangerous.
wipe.confirmation: Are you absolutely sure you want to delete every single file and folder on this server? This cannot be undone and will likely break any running processes.

ignored.title: Ignored Content
ignored.description: Hide specific files or folders from the view.
ignored.info: Patterns are case-sensitive. These filters only affect your local view and do not delete any files on the server.

permissions.title: Update Permissions
permissions.info: Be careful when changing permissions. Incorrect settings can make files inaccessible or insecure.

preview.error: Failed to load image preview. Please try downloading it instead.

dashboard.cache_cleared: System cache has been cleared successfully.

app_url_warning.message: Your panel is currently using the default featherpanel.mythical.systems URL. This will cause security issues and breaks authentication.

version.up_to_date: Your system is up to date and secured.

spells.select_realm_error: Please select a realm before installing

online_banner.title: Have some spells to share?
online_banner.description: Publish your creations to the community. Download your spell and head over to our cloud platform. Our team aims to review and publish within 48 hours.
online_banner.tip: Tip: Include description, tags, and a banner for better visibility.

grid.unverified_warning: Unverified spell - review source before installing

dialog.title: Install Spell
dialog.realm_help: Select the realm where this spell will be installed.
dialog.unverified_desc: This spell is not verified. Installing unverified spells can be unsafe. Please review the source code before installing.

help.repo_desc: Browse community-created spells from our online repository. Install directly from this page with a single click.
help.install_desc: Select a realm and install spells with one click. Verified spells are marked with a checkmark for your safety.
help.security_desc: Installing third-party spells can be risky. FeatherPanel and its team are not liable for what you install.

cloud_management.title: FeatherCloud Cloud Management
cloud_management.subtitle: Connect your FeatherPanel instance to FeatherCloud using secure credentials

connection_status.connected_desc: Your panel is successfully linked. You can access premium plugins, FeatherAI, and cloud intelligence services.
connection_status.not_connected_desc: Link your panel with FeatherCloud to access premium features and cloud services.

credentials.title: Credential Information
credentials.description: Last rotation timestamps for your cloud credentials

feather_ai.title: FeatherAI
feather_ai.description: Access FeatherPanel's built-in AI model for intelligent automation and analysis without requiring external API keys.

premium_plugins.title: Premium Plugins
premium_plugins.description: Download and install paid plugins directly from the FeatherCloud marketplace with seamless integration.

cloud_intelligence.title: Cloud Intelligence Database
cloud_intelligence.description: Protect your host from abuse with real-time threat intelligence from across the FeatherCloud network.

identification.title: Instance Identification
identification.description: Your credentials uniquely identify your FeatherPanel instance to its owner.

privacy.title: Security & Privacy
privacy.description: All credentials are encrypted and scoped to your environment.

permissions.title: Permission-Based Access
permissions.description: Keys inherit administrator permissions for granular control.

audit.title: Full Audit Trail
audit.description: Every cloud service interaction is logged for complete traceability.

oauth2.title: OAuth2 Integration
oauth2.description: Securely link your panel with FeatherCloud using OAuth2 authentication
oauth2.step1: You'll be redirected to FeatherCloud's OAuth2 authorization page
oauth2.step2: Your panel information (name, logo, URL) will be securely shared
oauth2.step3: FeatherCloud will generate and store the necessary credentials
oauth2.step4: You'll be redirected back to your panel once the connection is established

rotate_dialog.title: Confirm Key Rotation
rotate_dialog.description: Are you sure you want to rotate your FeatherCloud credentials? This action will generate new keys for your panel.
rotate_dialog.warning1: New keys will be generated immediately
rotate_dialog.warning2: You must update your FeatherCloud account with the new keys
rotate_dialog.warning3: Old keys will no longer work after rotation
rotate_dialog.warning4: Cloud credentials are currently empty - premium plugins cannot be downloaded until FeatherCloud credentials are configured

finish.processing_desc: Please wait while we save your cloud credentials...
finish.success_desc: Your panel is now linked with FeatherCloud. You can now access premium plugins, FeatherAI, and cloud intelligence services.
finish.next_step1: Access premium plugins from the FeatherCloud marketplace
finish.next_step2: Use FeatherAI for intelligent automation and analysis
finish.next_step3: Benefit from cloud intelligence database for abuse prevention
finish.error_desc: Please try linking again from the Cloud Management page.

users.title: Users
users.subtitle: Manage all users in your system
users.search_placeholder: Search by username, email, or role...

create.title: Create User
create.description: Fill in the details to create a new user
create.validation: Please fill in all required fields

tips.username: Choose a unique username that's easy to remember
tips.role: Assign the appropriate role based on user responsibilities
tips.email: User will receive login credentials via email

help.security_desc: Ensure strong passwords and assign minimal required permissions. Users can enable 2FA after first login.

managing.title: Managing Users
managing.description: View, create, and edit accounts. Use the search to quickly find users by username, email, or role. Pagination and column visibility are customizable.

roles.title: Roles & Permissions
roles.description: Assign roles to control access and capabilities. Role badges reflect the assigned role, and colors help you spot important roles at a glance.

security.title: Security Actions
security.item1: Ban or unban accounts when needed
security.item3: Audit activities, servers, and mails per user

form.title: User Details
form.external_id_help: External ID for integration. Leave empty or set to 0 to clear.
form.password_placeholder: Leave blank to keep current password
form.password_help: Leave completely blank to keep the current password.

messages.discord_confirm: Are you sure you want to unlink Discord from this user?
messages.ban_confirm: Are you sure you want to ban/unban this user?
messages.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete user {username}?

form.title: Title
form.create_description: Create a new notification to display to users.

messages.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this notification?
